name: Doctor Who: The Adventure Games - City of the Daleks
name_original: Doctor Who: The Adventure Games - City of the Daleks
description:
Doctor Who: The Adventure Games - City of the Daleks is an adventure game developed by Sumo Digital. It came out on 03-06-2010. BBC published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Doctor Who: The Adventure Games - City of the Daleks is available on PC.
